topics.title: Talk about Your Favorite Sport
topics.prompt: Describe your favorite sport and explain why you like it.
topics.hint: 請描述你喜歡的運動，並說明理由。可以談談你怎麼玩這個運動和它帶給你的感受。
topics.sample: My favorite sport is swimming. I like it because it is good exercise and fun. I enjoy swimming in the pool with my friends. It helps me stay healthy and feel happy.

topics.title: Describe a Race You Participated In
topics.prompt: Tell a story about a race you joined. Describe how you felt and what happened.
topics.hint: 請分享一次你參加過的比賽。描述比賽中的過程和你的感覺。
topics.sample: Last year, I joined a running race at school. At the start, I felt nervous but excited. I ran as fast as I could. In the end, I didn't win, but I was proud because I tried my best.

topics.title: Explain How to Play a Game
topics.prompt: Explain the rules of a sport or game you know to a friend.
topics.hint: 請用英文說明一個你會玩的運動或遊戲規則，讓朋友能了解怎麼玩。
topics.sample: In skipping rope, you jump over the rope when it swings under your feet. You can do single jumps or double jumps. The goal is to keep jumping without stopping or falling.

topics.title: Describe Feelings When Winning or Losing
topics.prompt: Talk about how you feel when you win or lose a game or competition.
topics.hint: 描述你贏或輸比賽時的感受，可以說說你的心情變化。
topics.sample: When I win, I feel very happy and proud. But when I lose, I feel a little sad at first. However, I also try to learn from losing and get ready for the next game.

topics.title: Imagine a New Sport
topics.prompt: Create a new sport and describe how it is played.
topics.hint: 發揮想像力，設計一個新的運動，說明玩法和規則。
topics.sample: I invented a sport called JumpBall. Players jump and try to catch a ball in the air. The team that catches the most balls wins. It is fun and needs good jumping skills.

topics.title: Describe Your Exercise Routine
topics.prompt: Describe how you exercise every day or every week.
topics.hint: 說說你平時如何運動，可以說一天或一週的運動計劃。
topics.sample: I exercise three times a week. I usually run for 30 minutes and then do some skipping rope. Exercise helps me feel strong and healthy.

topics.title: Talk about Encouraging a Friend
topics.prompt: Describe how you encourage a friend who is losing in a game.
topics.hint: 描述你如何安慰或鼓勵正在輸的朋友，可以說說你會說什麼話。
topics.sample: If my friend is losing, I tell them not to give up. I say, 'You can do it! Try again and have fun.' It helps them feel better and keep trying.

topics.title: Describe a Fun Sports Event
topics.prompt: Describe a fun sports event you watched or took part in.
topics.hint: 講述一次有趣的運動比賽或活動，可以是你看過或參加過的。
topics.sample: Last summer, I watched a swimming competition. The swimmers were very fast, and the crowd was cheering loudly. It was exciting and fun to watch.

topics.title: Talk about Teamwork in Sports
topics.prompt: Explain why teamwork is important in sports.
topics.hint: 解釋為什麼團隊合作在運動中很重要，可以舉例說明。
topics.sample: Teamwork helps players work well together. In games like basketball, passing the ball and helping each other can lead to winning. Good teamwork makes sports more fun and successful.
